<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataSI extends data { const CODE = 'SI'; const PREFIX = 386; const REGION = 'Europe'; const PATTERNS = array( '[1-7]\d{7}|8\d{4,7}|90\d{4,6}', ); const TYPES = array( '(?:[1-357][2-8]|4[24-8])\d{6}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '65(?:1\d|55|[67]0)\d{4}|(?:[37][01]|4[0139]|51|6[489])\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '80\d{4,6}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '89[1-3]\d{2,5}|90\d{4,6}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '(?:59\d\d|8(?:1(?:[67]\d|8[01389])|2(?:0\d|2[0378]|8[0-2489])|3[389]\d))\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{2})(\d{3,6})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{5})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{2})(\d{3})(\d{3})'=>'$1 $2 $3', '(\d)(\d{3})(\d{2})(\d{2})'=>'$1 $2 $3 $4', ); }
